item.title: Should we crack on?
item.description:

item.dc:creator: Andres Guisado
item.content:encoded:
Not the first time!

This is not the first time I'm trying to setup a blog but hope this time is the good one.
Find the time to do this is not an easy thing but I'll make my best effort.

I'm working as DevOps consultant helping companies out on their DevOps journey for the last three years and have been working as System Administrator over the rest of my career.

The idea of this blog is to share my experiences, thoughts and labs as well as improving myself facing this new challenge.

Hoping you enjoy it and keep in touch!
